Posts.Content: Sunshine_6 wrote: Hi, I have been diagnosed with paggets on my nipple and DC on my right breast 3 weeks ago. They suggest I have to start quemo first then surgery, radiation last because of the HER2+. I’m supposed to start quemo next week and I can’t stop thinking about it, since the day I was diagnosed I feel like I’m not the same person anymore and can’t concentrate in one thing at the time. We are a family of 3 only and it is going to be hard for us to take turns to watch our child Dx DCIS/Paget's, Right, 1cm, Stage IIB, Grade 3, HER2+ (IHC) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I’m 35 feeling overwhelmed and nervous Sunshine_6 Daniz1983
